title: Borders
subTitle: Unequal borders on a small product can be very noticeable even with a slight cutting error.
action: Check for a clear frame around the customers design.

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Send a side conversation to Artwork_Complaints inbox with the artwork complaints macro.

options.action: Place the cPDF in the Template linked to the order & offset by 3mm then compare to the complaint pictures.

question.text: What type of order is this?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: We need to review these case by case. Take into account such factors as: Priority Client, amount of orders total, amount of prior complaints, amount spent total, purchase price vs. customer price.

options.text: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

solution.title: Borders
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Select one of the following resolutions based on customer type

questions.title: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: There are no clear borders on the design and the product was cut accurately. We can not validate the complaint.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description: We've reviewed your design and found that there were no clear borders, which resulted in the product being cut accurately according to the provided file. Unfortunately, we cannot validate the complaint based on the current design. However, as a new customer, we want to ensure your satisfaction. We can offer you a reprint with a revised design, provide a discount on the current order, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will make the necessary arrangements.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description: We've reviewed your design and found that there were no clear borders, resulting in the product being cut accurately as per the provided file. As a result, we cannot validate the complaint based on the current design. As a returning customer, we value your continued support and want to offer you a solution. We can provide a 10% discount on this order, a voucher for a future purchase, or a reprint with a revised design if you prefer. Please let us know your preference, and we will make the necessary arrangements to ensure your satisfaction.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill Complaint Type: Wrong artwork uploaded

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: There are no clear borders in the design but the supplier has cut incorrectly causing the design to be off centered on the printed page. We can reprint with the same file.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description: We've noticed that while there were no clear borders in your design, an issue occurred where the product was cut incorrectly, causing the design to be off-centered on the printed page. We can offer you a reprint with the same file at no additional cost, provide a discount on the current order, or issue a refund if a reprint is not feasible due to time constraints. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will make the necessary arrangements to resolve the issue.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier Complaint Type: Cutting

options.action: Check the order description/SKU for the size.

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Send a side conversation to Artwork_Complaints inbox with the artwork complaints macro.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier Complaint Type: Cutting

options.action: Check the DTP log and look for a green 'DTP Message - Borders not recommended' warning
Automatic: Open the DTP Tab in Presta & check 'AutoCheck Artwork' box. Manual: 'Open the DTP Tab in Presta, check 'Attachments' box, and see agent name under 'Uploaded by.

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Borders in small orders can make slight cutting deviations very noticeable.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: We apologize for not warning you about the borders on small-size orders. We can reprint with a borderless file, or use the same file if the borders are crucial, though this carries a risk of visible cutting deviations. If a reprint is no longer feasible, we can offer a discount or issue a full refund. Please let us know your preference.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Manual Artwork Check Complaint Type: No Warning sent

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Borders in small orders can make slight cutting deviations very noticeable.

solution.title: Borders
solution.action:
File and finish the complaint in Presta. 
Select one of the following resolutions based on customer type

questions.title: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Clear borders on the design and the customer was correctly warned and the product was cut accurately. We can not validate the complaint.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description: We've reviewed your design and found that there were clear borders, which we warned you about. These borders were cut accurately according to the provided file. Unfortunately, we cannot validate the complaint based on the current design. However, as a new customer, we want to ensure your satisfaction. We can offer you a reprint with a revised design, provide a discount on the current order, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will make the necessary arrangements.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description: We've reviewed your design and found that there were clear borders, which we warned you about. These borders were cut accurately according to the provided file. As a returning customer, we value your continued support and want to offer you a solution. We can provide a 10% discount on this order, a voucher for a future purchase, or a reprint with a revised design if you prefer. Please let us know your preference, and we will make the necessary arrangements to ensure your satisfaction.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Clear borders in the design were cut very poorly by supplier causing the design to be off centered on the printed page. We can reprint with the same file.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: Clear borders in the design were cut poorly, causing the design to be off-centered on the printed page. We can reprint with the same file at no additional cost. If a reprint is no longer feasible, we can offer a discount on this order or issue a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
